titles: A declaration of the officers and souldiers under the command of Colonell Twisleton, governor of the castle of Denbigh in Wales.
author: Twisleton, George.
publisher: Printed for John Wright, at the Kings-Head in the Old-Bayley,
notes: Dated at end: Denbigh this 12. of June, 1648. Signed: George Twisleton. &c.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
